about_the_game:
Welcome to a breathtaking world where you will fold your own paper plane and fly your message to the end.
In this interactive, semi-open world adventure, players uncover the art of flight in uniquely styled landscapes. Every environment presents its own challenges and offers distinct ways to master momentum flow. Explore, interact, and learn movement techniques in ways that fit your style, making every journey a personal experience.



Fold your paper

One of the game's pivotal mechanics lies in the ability to seamlessly shift between the gliding paper plane and the rolling paper ball, utilizing each form's distinct advantages. Gain momentum, pass through obstacles, jump and glide into the horizon to unveil hidden areas, unearthing new movement powers giving you a dynamic edge to your adventure; rewarding dedicated players while ensuring everyone can enjoy the game at their own pace and style.

Impactful World

Embracing a world of sophisticated physics realism, the game's flight mechanics focus on gliding. Master the delicate balance of gaining momentum to stay airborne— Learn how to gracefully glide. Failure to maintain momentum could leave you grounded, transforming back into a ball until you regain the necessary speed to take flight. Colliding with objects will result in deformation, altering flight dynamics and pushing boundaries of real-time physics.

The environment isn't just a backdrop—it's an interactive playground. Experience advanced physics and visual effects that react to your every move. Your journey leaves a visible impact, shaping the world around you and making your adventure feel truly impactful.

Immerse yourself and explore a world inviting you to soar, learn, and leave your mark on its pages!
